evidence.text: This order shall remain in effect for no longer than fourteen (14) days
Petitioners and members of the provisionally certified class shall not be transferred outside the District of Colorado.

extracted.value: Petitioners and members of the provisionally certified class shall not be transferred outside the District of Colorado.

evidence.text: Respondents shall not remove any member of the putative class of detainees from the United States until further order from the Supreme Court.

extracted.value: Respondents shall not remove any member of the putative class of detainees from the United States until further order from the Supreme Court.

evidence.text: Respondents shall provide a twenty-one (21) day notice to individuals detained pursuant to the Act and Proclamation. Such notice must state the government intends to remove individuals pursuant to the Act and Proclamation. It must also provide notice of a right to seek judicial review, and inform individuals they may consult an attorney regarding their detainment and the government’s intent to remove them. Such notice must be written in a language the individual understands.

extracted.value: Respondents must provide a twenty-one (21) day notice to individuals detained pursuant to the Act and Proclamation, including notice of a right to seek judicial review and informing individuals they may consult an attorney, and must provide notice in a language the individual understands.
